pages.page:
I FEEL FEEDBACK TO BUSINESSES IS WONDERFUL, ESPECIALLY AS A LOCAL PERSON IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD, BECAUSE IT KEEPS A GREAT RELATIONSHIP WHEN PEOPLE ARE GOOD TO YOU. WHAT MORE CAN HAPPEN, BUT BETTER BUSINESS AND CUSTOMER SERVICE?
CATHEDRAL WINE, NEW YORK, NY How
To
Use
Ideacoil
1 Start Re-Imagine Design your interactive feedback questionnaire. Offer a custom reward to the Feedbackers in exchange for their insights.
2 Invite The Crowd Invite current customers and industry Feedbackers to participate in your online or in-person events.
3 Understand Your Customer And Ratings
Manage feedback from your personal dashboard. Analyze the data to find patterns and quickly determine what work needs to be recalibrated.
